thread.title: This Show Has the Best Vintage Treasures
thread.title_full: This Show Has the Best Vintage Treasures -- The Cut

author: Lindsay Peoples
title: This Show Has the Best Vintage Treasures
text:
Vintage shopping requires patience, the willingness to dig, and the belief that you can find something worth the hassle. But if you're looking for affordable, on-trend vintage finds, Manhattan Vintage might be just what you're looking for. Every year, stylists and designers from Tory Burch to Marc Jacobs stop by and stock up. So do costume designers for shows like Girls and Boardwalk Empire .
Tickets are only $15, giving you access to over 90 of the country's top vintage dealers selling pieces from Jean Paul Gaultier, Givenchy, Lanvin, and more. The main attraction this year is a limited-edition collection of Versace collector's items — something we definitely don't want to miss. Manhattan Vintage is only open October 23 (1 p.m. to 8 p.m.) and October 24 (11 a.m. to 6 p.m.) at 125 West 18th Street.
